markdownRemark.html:
Oh boy - I just saw this. While I still dont believe that BTRFS is just as good as ZFS (despite Linux kernel developers saying different), Fedora is being leagues ahead of Ubuntu here.

What it means is for every package install, the OS snapshots your volumes and you can rollback in case of a problem.

Nifty!
